name: Database Designer
description: Stage 3 editor. Translates the abstract data model into a concrete database schema. User selects a DB engine, AI generates the schema with indexing strategy and migrations.

components.name: EngineSelector
components.description: Card grid for selecting database engine: PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, Supabase, PlanetScale. Each card shows engine logo, name, and brief pros. Selected engine is highlighted.

components.name: SchemaPreview
components.description: Read-only syntax-highlighted SQL (or equivalent) preview of the generated schema. Copy button. For MongoDB shows JSON schema.

components.name: IndexingStrategy
components.description: Table showing recommended indexes with table, columns, type (btree/gin/unique), and rationale. User can add/remove indexes.

components.name: MigrationPlan
components.description: Ordered list of migration steps with descriptions. Shows what each migration creates/modifies.

components.name: DualViewToggle
components.description: Toggle between Visual Schema (table diagram), SQL Preview, and JSON Config.

interactions.behavior: AI creates schema from data model + engine choice
